name: CardiBot
0:
”Alexa, open Cardi Bot”
”What are the recommendations for genetic testing?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cardi bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Written by leading experts and developed by the National Heart Foundation of Australia and the Cardiac Society of Australia and New Zealand, the guidelines provide evidence-based guidance on the clinical management of patients with heart failure. 

Cardi Bot provides answers based on the guidelines to your questions about heart failure. For example, you could ask:
• “What are the recommendations for genetic testing?”
• “Tell me about the recommendations for the diagnosis of heart failure” 
• “Should vasodilators be used for patients with acute heart failure?”

If you want to explore an area further, ask “Cardi Bot send me the paper” and the links to the guidelines and any additional papers will be emailed to you. 

To get started, simply say 'Launch Cardi Bot'. Once the skill launches you can fire away your questions!

The information in this skill is intended for healthcare professionals and is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not intended for patients and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
